about.description:
A tool to create visual and interactive standalone HTML reports from
collections of CSV/TSV tables.
Reports include automatically generated vega-lite histograms
per column. Plots can be fully customized by users via a config file.
These also allow the user to add linkouts to other websites or link
between multiple tables.
about.summary: A tool to create visual interactive standalone HTML reports from collections of CSV/TSV tables

name: datavzrd

about.description:
A tool to create visual and interactive standalone HTML reports from
collections of CSV/TSV tables.
Reports include automatically generated vega-lite histograms
per column. Plots can be fully customized by users via a config file.
These also allow the user to add linkouts to other websites or link
between multiple tables.
about.summary: A tool to create visual interactive standalone HTML reports from collections of CSV/TSV tables

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "datavzrd" %}
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/koesterlab/datavzrd/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9c2c42b67099e81932a7892cbfce644196b236dad49ee7c79254d4af2d0fbf6e

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('rust') }}
    - {{ compiler('c') }}

test:
  commands:
    - datavzrd --help

about:
  home: https://github.com/koesterlab/datavzrd
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A tool to create visual interactive standalone HTML reports from collections of CSV/TSV tables
  # The remaining entries in this section are optional, but recommended.
  description: |
    A tool to create visual and interactive standalone HTML reports from 
    collections of CSV/TSV tables. 
    Reports include automatically generated vega-lite histograms 
    per column. Plots can be fully customized by users via a config file. 
    These also allow the user to add linkouts to other websites or link 
    between multiple tables.
  doc_url: https://github.com/koesterlab/datavzrd
  dev_url: https://github.com/koesterlab/datavzrd

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - johanneskoester
    - fxwiegand
